pageContext.claim: “Looking forward to helping New York City and Governor @andrewcuomo complete the long anticipated, and partially built, Second Avenue Subway. Would be extended to East 125th Street in Harlem. Long in the making, they now have the team that can get it done!”
pageContext.analysis: The Second Avenue subway has long been the third rail of New York City construction woes, but it’s not clear what Trump is talking about here. New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s spokesperson noted there is “no specific funding or approval” that has been approved.
